class.name: FractionConversionException

javadoc.text: Error thrown when a double value cannot be converted to a fraction * in the allowed number of iterations.
Constructs an exception with specified formatted detail message. * Message formatting is delegated to {@link java.text.MessageFormat}.
javadoc.param: maxIterations maximal number of iterations allowed

javadoc.text: Constructs an exception with specified formatted detail message. * Message formatting is delegated to {@link java.text.MessageFormat}.
